description: Updates the SPICE capacity configuration for a Amazon QuickSight account.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the SPICE configuration that you want to update.

parameters.name: PurchaseMode
parameters.description: Determines how SPICE capacity can be purchased. The following options are available. MANUAL: SPICE capacity can only be purchased manually. AUTO_PURCHASE: Extra SPICE capacity is automatically purchased on your behalf as needed. SPICE capacity can also be purchased manually with this option.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
